programme.title: Back to the Future
programme.desc: Marty McFly, a typical American teenager of the 1980s, is accidentally sent back to 1955 in a plutonium-powered DeLorean time machine, invented by a slightly mad scientist. During his often hysterical but amazing trip back in time, Marty must make certain his teenage parents-to-be meet and fall in love so that he can get back to the future.

programme.title: Back to the Future
programme.desc: Marty McFly, a typical American teenager of the 1980s, is accidentally sent back to 1955 in a plutonium-powered DeLorean time machine, invented by a slightly mad scientist. During his often hysterical but amazing trip back in time, Marty must make certain his teenage parents-to-be meet and fall in love so that he can get back to the future.

programme.title: Junior
programme.desc: You'll never guess who's going to have a baby. Watch as the maternal tables are turned forever when, after taking an experimental drug, a male scientist becomes pregnant.

programme.title: Junior
programme.desc: You'll never guess who's going to have a baby. Watch as the maternal tables are turned forever when, after taking an experimental drug, a male scientist becomes pregnant.

programme.title: Every Which Way But Loose
programme.desc: Philo Beddoe likes beer, brawling and country music. When he falls for a sexy singer, he sets out to win her with Clyde his orangutan in tow.

programme.title: Every Which Way But Loose
programme.desc: Philo Beddoe likes beer, brawling and country music. When he falls for a sexy singer, he sets out to win her with Clyde his orangutan in tow.

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: A magic movie ticket transports a young fan onto the screen with his action hero, but things blow up when a notorious movie villain uses the ticket to break into the real world.

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: A magic movie ticket transports a young fan onto the screen with his action hero, but things blow up when a notorious movie villain uses the ticket to break into the real world.

programme.title: Kindergarten Cop
programme.desc: Follows an undercover cop whose attempt to locate a boy and his mother leads him to a kindergarten where he poses as an unlikely teacher. A classic comedy with a sharp crime edge to it.

programme.desc: Follows an undercover cop whose attempt to locate a boy and his mother leads him to a kindergarten where he poses as an unlikely teacher. A classic comedy with a sharp crime edge to it.

programme.title: Mercury Rising
programme.desc: An orphaned autistic savant who deciphers a government code in a magazine triggers a national security alarm that makes him an assassin's target.

programme.title: Mercury Rising
programme.desc: An orphaned autistic savant who deciphers a government code in a magazine triggers a national security alarm that makes him an assassin's target.

programme.title: Cliffhanger
programme.desc: A year after his friend's death, Gabe must return to the dreaded mountain peaks, where he finds himself trapped in a desperate battle against criminals, nature and himself.

programme.title: Cliffhanger
programme.desc: A year after his friend's death, Gabe must return to the dreaded mountain peaks, where he finds himself trapped in a desperate battle against criminals, nature and himself.

programme.title: Tango & Cash
programme.desc: Two narcotics detectives can't stand each other. When a crime lord frames them for murder, they have to buddy up to clear their names and put him away.

programme.title: Tango & Cash
programme.desc: Two narcotics detectives can't stand each other. When a crime lord frames them for murder, they have to buddy up to clear their names and put him away.

programme.title: Gogglebox Australia
programme.desc: The Goggleboxers share their thoughts on the week's TV highlights including, The Great Celebrity Bake Off, Lost for Words, The School that Tried to End Racism, and Rick Stein: From Venice to Istanbul.

programme.title: Grand Designs UK
programme.desc: In 2019, Olaf and Fritha build a triangular house on a tricky plot, boxed in by a train line and an A road. Kevin returns to see how life has been for Olaf, Fritha and their daughter, Lagertha.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Antiques experts travel across the nation to search for hidden treasures, from household items to one-of-a kind collectibles; the experts then head to auction to battle it out.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: A special episode aboard the Flying Scotsman celebrates the golden age of travel. Fiona Bruce joins after the locomotive's ten year restoration is complete.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Today's Bargain Hunt comes from Kington's Antique Centre in South West London. Nick Hall and Caroline Hawley guide the teams with 300 pounds to spend on three items.

programme.title: 24 Hours in Emergency
programme.desc: 79-year-old Arthur has stomach pain. Tom, 20, collapses with chest pain while at work as a wine merchant and is rushed to Resus.

programme.title: The Great British Sewing Bee
programme.desc: It's Art Week with a Modernist skirt, transformed canvases, and Surrealist-inspired outfits that push creativity to the limit.

programme.title: Alison Hammond's Big Weekend
programme.desc: Hollywood star, Luke Evans shares his struggles with bullying and being raised as a Jehovah's Witness.

programme.title: Luxury Escapes: World's Best Holidays
programme.desc: Rebecca Gibney and Cameron Daddo discover New Zealand's South Island with luxury lodges, fine wine, whale flights, spas, and jet boat thrills.

programme.title: Kirstie and Phil's Love It or List It
programme.desc: This time Kirstie and Phil are in Swansea, to help Sarah and Caradog.

programme.title: World's Greatest Hotels
programme.desc: Exploring the most iconic and amazing hotels around the world.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: We catch up with two sets of house-hunters who've moved onwards and upwards since we first searched with them.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location Australia
programme.desc: Two couples making giant moves. Sean and Kelly are leaving Melbourne for Cairns on a heart-warming search to help a mate. Fabrice and Meggy are putting down roots in Brisbane.

programme.title: Selling Houses Australia
programme.desc: Gill and Diane are keen to sell up and travel round Australia but they've only had two viewings in eight months. Their home needs a serious update, luckily Andrew and his makeover team are on hand.

programme.title: Selling Houses Australia
programme.desc: There's only one thing worse than a forced sale and that's a forced sale in a falling market. Single mum Tania has two kids and is currently facing this ordeal.

programme.title: Love It Or List It Australia
programme.desc: Blair is a FIFO worker and just doesn't want to do more work around the house. His wife Nora loves the location & size of their home and prays something can be done to fix it.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia
programme.desc: Peter is building an underground eco bunker that's self-sufficient, sleek and completely one of a kind. From the outside it will eventually look like a bush garden, but below ground a man cave.

programme.title: Kirstie and Phil's Love It or List It
programme.desc: This time, Kirstie and Phil are in Caterham, Surrey, to help Ruth and Ken settle their debate over their three-storey town house.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location New Zealand
programme.desc: The smash hit property series lands in New Zealand as Jayne Kiely and Paul Glover help Kiwis navigate the housing market.

programme.title: Alan Cumming's Paradise Homes
programme.desc: Alan escapes to a waterside fantasy retreat, a sun-soaked property with endless skylights, and a tranquil floating villa designed for relaxation.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia
programme.desc: Hoteliers Richard and Denise have knocked down their home and are rebuilding an even bigger version. With resort-like luxury on three tiered acres, are they creating a home or a hotel?

programme.title: Selling Houses Australia
programme.desc: Gill and Diane are keen to sell up and travel round Australia but they've only had two viewings in eight months. Their home needs a serious update, luckily Andrew and his makeover team are on hand.

programme.title: Love It Or List It Australia
programme.desc: Blair is a FIFO worker and just doesn't want to do more work around the house. His wife Nora loves the location & size of their home and prays something can be done to fix it.

programme.title: 24 Hours in Emergency
programme.desc: Stanlie, 24, is airlifted after being impaled on a metal pole at a construction site. Max and his 2 year old daughter Darcy are rushed in after a van and bus crash.

programme.title: Inside the Ambulance
programme.desc: Join the paramedics as they treat a woman trapped in her car after a crash, a man with a hernia and a poorly three-year-old. Plus, they're called to an elderly woman who's badly cut her legs.

programme.title: The Firm
programme.desc: A young gun takes a job in a law firm with connections to the Mafia and is soon caught up in blackmail.

programme.title: The Firm
programme.desc: A young gun takes a job in a law firm with connections to the Mafia and is soon caught up in blackmail.

programme.title: Apollo 13
programme.desc: Stranded 205,000 miles from Earth in a crippled spacecraft, astronauts Jim Lovell, Fred Haise and Jack Swigert fight a desperate battle to survive. Meanwhile, at Mission Control, astronaut Ken Mattingly, flight director Gene Kranz and a heroic ground crew race against time - and the odds - to bring them home.

programme.title: Apollo 13
programme.desc: Stranded 205,000 miles from Earth in a crippled spacecraft, astronauts Jim Lovell, Fred Haise and Jack Swigert fight a desperate battle to survive. Meanwhile, at Mission Control, astronaut Ken Mattingly, flight director Gene Kranz and a heroic ground crew race against time - and the odds - to bring them home.

programme.title: Dear Evan Hansen
programme.desc: In this film adaptation of the Broadway phenomenon, Evan Hansen is an anxious, isolated high-schooler who aches for understanding and belonging amid the chaos and cruelty of the social media age.

programme.title: Dear Evan Hansen
programme.desc: In this film adaptation of the Broadway phenomenon, Evan Hansen is an anxious, isolated high-schooler who aches for understanding and belonging amid the chaos and cruelty of the social media age.

programme.title: Where The Crawdads Sing
programme.desc: Kya, an abandoned girl who raised herself in dangerous marshland, is drawn to two young men from town. When one is found dead, she is the main suspect.

programme.title: Where The Crawdads Sing
programme.desc: Kya, an abandoned girl who raised herself in dangerous marshland, is drawn to two young men from town. When one is found dead, she is the main suspect.

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love
programme.desc: Celebrate the life and music of an icon who inspired generations through his message of love, peace, and unity. In this powerful and uplifting film, discover Bob Marley's incredible story of overcoming adversity and the journey behind his revolutionary music that changed the world.

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love
programme.desc: Celebrate the life and music of an icon who inspired generations through his message of love, peace, and unity. In this powerful and uplifting film, discover Bob Marley's incredible story of overcoming adversity and the journey behind his revolutionary music that changed the world.

programme.title: Non-Stop
programme.desc: Air Marshal Bill Marks receives cryptic text messages during a flight demanding the airline to transfer $150 million into an off-shore account - or a passenger will be killed every 20 minutes.

programme.title: Non-Stop
programme.desc: Air Marshal Bill Marks receives cryptic text messages during a flight demanding the airline to transfer $150 million into an off-shore account - or a passenger will be killed every 20 minutes.

programme.title: Billy Elliot
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old miner's son Billy Elliot is on his way to boxing lessons when he stumbles upon a ballet class. Billy secretly joins the class, knowing that his blue-collar family would never understand. Under the guidance of his teacher, Mrs Wilkinson, Billy's raw talent takes flight. When his father discovers his son's ambition, Billy must fight for his dreams and his destiny.

programme.title: Billy Elliot
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old miner's son Billy Elliot is on his way to boxing lessons when he stumbles upon a ballet class. Billy secretly joins the class, knowing that his blue-collar family would never understand. Under the guidance of his teacher, Mrs Wilkinson, Billy's raw talent takes flight. When his father discovers his son's ambition, Billy must fight for his dreams and his destiny.

programme.title: The International
programme.desc: An Interpol Agent and Manhattan Assistant District Attorney are determined to bring to justice one of the world's most powerful banks.

programme.title: The International
programme.desc: An Interpol Agent and Manhattan Assistant District Attorney are determined to bring to justice one of the world's most powerful banks.

programme.title: Trouble with the Curve
programme.desc: Gus Lobel has been a top baseball scout for decades, but age has caught up with him. Enter Gus's estranged daughter, an ambitious attorney who joins him for one last recruiting trip.

programme.title: Trouble with the Curve
programme.desc: Gus Lobel has been a top baseball scout for decades, but age has caught up with him. Enter Gus's estranged daughter, an ambitious attorney who joins him for one last recruiting trip.

programme.title: I.S.S.
programme.desc: Tensions flare in the near-future aboard the International Space Station as a conflict breaks out on Earth.

programme.title: I.S.S.
programme.desc: Tensions flare in the near-future aboard the International Space Station as a conflict breaks out on Earth.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: A Harvard professor implicated in a murder must unravel an ancient code to expose the greatest conspiracy in history.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: A Harvard professor implicated in a murder must unravel an ancient code to expose the greatest conspiracy in history.

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: When Robert Langdon wakes up in an Italian hospital with amnesia, he teams up with Dr Sienna Brooks, and together they must race across Europe against the clock to foil a deadly global plot.

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: When Robert Langdon wakes up in an Italian hospital with amnesia, he teams up with Dr Sienna Brooks, and together they must race across Europe against the clock to foil a deadly global plot.

programme.title: The Dark Knight Rises
programme.desc: It has been years since Batman vanished into the night, turning from hero to fugitive. Everything will change with the arrival of a cunning cat burglar, and the emergence of masked terrorist, Bane.

programme.title: Godzilla: King of the Monsters
programme.desc: An epic action adventure that pits Godzilla against some of the most popular monsters in pop culture history. The new story follows the heroic efforts of the crypto-zoological agency Monarch as its members face off against a battery of god-sized monsters, including the mighty Godzilla, who collides with Mothra, Rodan, and his ultimate nemesis, the three-headed King Ghidorah. When these ancient super-species thought to be mere myths rise again, they all vie for supremacy, leaving humanity's very existence hanging in the balance.

programme.title: Godzilla vs. Kong
programme.desc: Legends collide as Godzilla and Kong, the two most powerful forces of nature, clash on the big screen in a spectacular battle for the ages. As a squadron embarks on a perilous mission into fantastic uncharted terrain, unearthing clues to the Titans' very origins and mankind's survival, a conspiracy threatens to wipe the creatures, both good and bad, from the face of the earth forever.

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: Godzilla and the almighty Kong face a colossal threat hidden deep within the planet, challenging their very existence and the survival of the human race.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
programme.desc: A young Peter Parker/Spider-Man begins to navigate his new-found identity as the web-slinging superhero. Thrilled by his experience with the Avengers, Peter returns home where he lives with his Aunt May, under the watchful eye of his new mentor, Tony Stark. Peter tries to fall back into his normal daily routine - distracted by thoughts of proving himself to be more than just your friendly neighbourhood Spider-Man. But when the Vulture emerges as a new villain, everything that Peter holds most important will be threatened.

programme.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
programme.desc: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

programme.title: Morbius
programme.desc: Biochemist Dr Michael Morbius tries to cure himself of a rare blood disease, but he inadvertently infects himself with a form of vampirism instead.

programme.title: Kraven the Hunter
programme.desc: Kraven's complex relationship with his ruthless father starts him down a path of vengeance, motivating him to become not only the greatest hunter in the world, but also one of its most feared.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
programme.desc: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organisation's name.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation
programme.desc: Ethan and team take on their most impossible mission yet, eradicating a highly skilled international rogue organisation that is committed to destroying the IMF.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
programme.desc: On a dangerous assignment, Ethan chooses to save his team over completing the mission, allowing nuclear weapons to fall into the wrong hands. The IMF team must stop the fallout.

programme.title: The Grudge
programme.desc: A house is cursed by a vengeful ghost that curses those who enter it with a violent death.

programme.title: Land of the Dead
programme.desc: Packed with more heart-pounding and blood-curdling thrills than any theatre could show, this special unleashes the ultimate vision of George A Romero's latest living-dead shock-fest.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: Spider-Man's greatest battle begins when an evil corporation attempts world domination by deploying an army of super villains to crush Peter Parker.

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
programme.desc: When a teenage rebel is sent to Japan to live with his father, he is hooked on the treacherous world of street racing.

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Abby Collins, a former Marine who is now a happily married housewife, soon discovers she will need to put her skills to use when her past comes to haunt her.

programme.title: The Dark Tower
programme.desc: Roland and the Man in Black share an ancient vendetta: they must fight to the death in an epic battle over the fate of the universe. The last Gunslinger, Roland Deschain has been locked in an eternal battle with Walter O'Dim, also known as the Man in Black, determined to prevent him from toppling the Dark Tower, which holds the universe together. With the fate of the worlds at stake, good and evil will collide in the ultimate battle as only Roland can defend the Tower from the Man in Black.

programme.title: Snakes on a Plane
programme.desc: FBI agent Flynn has to transport a witness, but as the plane reaches 30,000 feet, hundreds of deadly snakes are released, causing violent mayhem.

programme.title: Geostorm
programme.desc: A system of satellites designed to protect the earth from natural disasters starts to malfunction, but who is responsible and can it be stopped?

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: Based on the classic Hasbro naval combat game, this is the story of an international fleet of ships that come across an alien armada while on a naval war games exercise.

programme.title: Doomsday
programme.desc: In this futuristic action, it's been 25 years since a wall was built around Scotland to halt the Reaper virus. Now, London's in danger and a cure must be found while up north anarchy is rife.

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Two Miami cops must find $100 million in stolen heroin before their department is shut down. With time running out, detectives Burnett and Lowrey track a master thief into the Miami underworld, dodging bullets and bad guys along the way. A sexy witness can identify the suspect, but a mix-up causes her to believe Burnett is Lowrey, forcing the partners to switch identities. Now, between shoot-outs and car chases, married man Burnett has to stick close to their only witness, while playboy Lowrey goes home to his partner's wife and kids to learn the joys of parenthood - the hard way.

programme.title: Death Race
programme.desc: The world's hunger for extreme sports and reality competitions has grown into reality TV bloodlust. Now, the most extreme racing competition has emerged and its contestants are murderous prisoners. The rules of the Death Race are simple: win five events and you're set free. Lose and you're road kill splashed across the Internet.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: In this sly satire, a group of elites gather to hunt ordinary Americans for sport. But one of The Hunted fights back against The Hunters' leader.

programme.title: Skyscraper
programme.desc: A security expert must infiltrate a burning skyscraper, 225 storeys above ground, when his family are trapped inside by criminals.

programme.title: She's Having a Baby
programme.desc: A couple face the terrors of adulthood, from interfering in-laws and career crises to overextended credit and maintaining a house, but are they up to the perils of impending parenthood?

programme.title: She's Having a Baby
programme.desc: A couple face the terrors of adulthood, from interfering in-laws and career crises to overextended credit and maintaining a house, but are they up to the perils of impending parenthood?

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: After a man pours out his love for his late wife on radio, a listener inexplicably decides that he is her destiny and treks across the USA to meet him.

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: After a man pours out his love for his late wife on radio, a listener inexplicably decides that he is her destiny and treks across the USA to meet him.

programme.title: Something Borrowed
programme.desc: Rachel is a generous and loyal pal to her engaged best friend Darcy. But after celebrating her 30th birthday, perpetual good girl Rachel unexpectedly ends up in the arms of Darcy's fiance.

programme.title: Something Borrowed
programme.desc: Rachel is a generous and loyal pal to her engaged best friend Darcy. But after celebrating her 30th birthday, perpetual good girl Rachel unexpectedly ends up in the arms of Darcy's fiance.

programme.title: Far from Heaven
programme.desc: Suburban America in the 1950s: a place where autumn leaves fall on cue, until scandal comes calling for a perfect wife.

programme.title: Far from Heaven
programme.desc: Suburban America in the 1950s: a place where autumn leaves fall on cue, until scandal comes calling for a perfect wife.

programme.title: Georgia Rule
programme.desc: In this heart-warming story, Georgia is a woman who lives by her own rules and she expects her rebellious granddaughter, to do the same - no is not an option.

programme.title: Georgia Rule
programme.desc: In this heart-warming story, Georgia is a woman who lives by her own rules and she expects her rebellious granddaughter, to do the same - no is not an option.

programme.title: Something to Talk About
programme.desc: A contemporary Southern wife and mother has the 'perfect life'. But when she learns that her husband has been unfaithful, she steps back and examines her life from a new perspective.

programme.title: Something to Talk About
programme.desc: A contemporary Southern wife and mother has the 'perfect life'. But when she learns that her husband has been unfaithful, she steps back and examines her life from a new perspective.

programme.title: Morning Glory
programme.desc: Trouble ensues when a feisty producer attempts to revive a struggling news program with feuding co-hosts.

programme.title: Morning Glory
programme.desc: Trouble ensues when a feisty producer attempts to revive a struggling news program with feuding co-hosts.

programme.title: Fool's Gold
programme.desc: An affable, modern-day treasure hunter neglects his marriage in pursuit of finding a legendary priceless treasure that was lost at sea many years ago.

programme.title: Fool's Gold
programme.desc: An affable, modern-day treasure hunter neglects his marriage in pursuit of finding a legendary priceless treasure that was lost at sea many years ago.

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Diary
programme.desc: A busy journalist embarks on a husband-seeking journey towards self-discovery with the help of two imperfect suitors.

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Diary
programme.desc: A busy journalist embarks on a husband-seeking journey towards self-discovery with the help of two imperfect suitors.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason
programme.desc: Everyone's favourite heroine is back and looking for love in her inimitable style. After finding the perfect boyfriend, her old playboy boss arrives and the fireworks begin.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason
programme.desc: Everyone's favourite heroine is back and looking for love in her inimitable style. After finding the perfect boyfriend, her old playboy boss arrives and the fireworks begin.

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Baby
programme.desc: After breaking up with Mark Darcy, Bridget Jones's "happily ever after" hasn't quite gone according to plan. Fortysomething and single again, she decides to focus on her job as top news producer and surround herself with old friends and new. For once, Bridget has everything completely under control. What could possibly go wrong? Then her love life takes a turn and Bridget meets a dashing American named Jack, the suitor who is everything Mr. Darcy is not. In an unlikely twist she finds herself pregnant, but with one hitch she can only be fifty percent sure of the identity of her baby's father.

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Baby
programme.desc: After breaking up with Mark Darcy, Bridget Jones's "happily ever after" hasn't quite gone according to plan. Fortysomething and single again, she decides to focus on her job as top news producer and surround herself with old friends and new. For once, Bridget has everything completely under control. What could possibly go wrong? Then her love life takes a turn and Bridget meets a dashing American named Jack, the suitor who is everything Mr. Darcy is not. In an unlikely twist she finds herself pregnant, but with one hitch she can only be fifty percent sure of the identity of her baby's father.

programme.title: Friends with Benefits
programme.desc: Justin Timberlake and Mila Kunis star as best friends who are both coming out of disastrous relationships. They decide to make a 'friends with benefits' pact vowing to stop the casual sex if either become emotionally attached. While the set-up works at first, soon the two friends fall in love and must re-evaluate what they mean to each other.

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Grey
programme.desc: This erotic romance charts the masochistic relationship between a sexually inexperienced woman and a steely businessman who harbours painful and long buried secrets from his past.

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Grey
programme.desc: This erotic romance charts the masochistic relationship between a sexually inexperienced woman and a steely businessman who harbours painful and long buried secrets from his past.

programme.title: The Polar Express
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve, a doubting boy boards a magical train that's headed to the North Pole and Santa Claus's home.

programme.title: The Polar Express
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve, a doubting boy boards a magical train that's headed to the North Pole and Santa Claus's home.

programme.title: Tom & Jerry
programme.desc: A legendary rivalry re-emerges when Jerry moves into New York City's finest hotel on the eve of the wedding of the century, forcing the desperate event planner to hire Tom to get rid of him. As mayhem ensues, the escalating cat-and-mouse battle soon threatens to destroy her career, the wedding, and possibly the hotel itself.

programme.title: Tom & Jerry
programme.desc: A legendary rivalry re-emerges when Jerry moves into New York City's finest hotel on the eve of the wedding of the century, forcing the desperate event planner to hire Tom to get rid of him. As mayhem ensues, the escalating cat-and-mouse battle soon threatens to destroy her career, the wedding, and possibly the hotel itself.

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon
programme.desc: Set in the mythical world of burly Vikings and fire-breathing dragons, a Viking teenager takes in an injured dragon and sees an opportunity to set his tribe on a new course.

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon
programme.desc: Set in the mythical world of burly Vikings and fire-breathing dragons, a Viking teenager takes in an injured dragon and sees an opportunity to set his tribe on a new course.

programme.title: Nanny McPhee & The Big Bang
programme.desc: Nanny McPhee appears at the door of a stressed young mother, who is trying to run the family farm while her husband is away at war. But once she's arrived, Nanny McPhee discovers that the children are fighting a war of their own against two spoiled city cousins who have just moved in and refuse to leave.

programme.title: Nanny McPhee & The Big Bang
programme.desc: Nanny McPhee appears at the door of a stressed young mother, who is trying to run the family farm while her husband is away at war. But once she's arrived, Nanny McPhee discovers that the children are fighting a war of their own against two spoiled city cousins who have just moved in and refuse to leave.

programme.title: Detective Pikachu
programme.desc: The world of Pokemon comes to life! The story begins when ace detective Harry Goodman goes mysteriously missing, prompting his 21-year-old son Tim to find out what happened. Aiding in the investigation is Harry's former Pokemon partner, Detective Pikachu: a hilariously wise-cracking, adorable super-sleuth who is a puzzlement even to himself. Finding that they are uniquely equipped to communicate with one another, Tim and Pikachu join forces on a thrilling adventure to unravel the tangled mystery. Chasing clues together through the neon-lit streets of Ryme City - a sprawling, modern metropolis where humans and Pokemon live side by side in a hyper-realistic live-action world - they encounter a diverse cast of Pokemon characters and uncover a shocking plot that could destroy this peaceful co-existence and threaten the whole Pokemon universe.

programme.title: The Croods
programme.desc: The story of the world's first family road trip. After their cave is destroyed, the Crood family must embark on a comedy adventure into strange and spectacular territory in search of a new home.

programme.desc: The journey begins when young adventurer Sean receives a coded distress signal from a mysterious island where no island should exist.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 4

More specifically, he's tapped to become the Spiritual Leader of the Valley of Peace.

programme.desc: An experiment with dinosaurs created from DNA becomes a disaster when sabotage sets the prehistoric monsters loose in an island theme park.

programme.title: Jumanji: The Next Level
programme.desc: The gang is back but the game has changed. They discover that nothing is as they expect, as they try to escape the world's most dangerous game.

programme.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
programme.desc: Alex, Marty, Melman and Gloria find themselves in Africa, where Alex meets his long-lost parents. Meanwhile, Makunga, his father's rival, will stop at nothing to be the king of the jungle.

programme.desc: Alex, Marty, Melman and Gloria find themselves in Africa, where Alex meets his long-lost parents. Meanwhile, Makunga, his father's rival, will stop at nothing to be the king of the jungle.

programme.title: Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted
programme.desc: Alex, Marty, Gloria and Melman are still fighting to get home to their beloved Big Apple. Their journey takes them through Europe where they find the perfect cover, a travelling circus.

programme.title: Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted
programme.desc: Alex, Marty, Gloria and Melman are still fighting to get home to their beloved Big Apple. Their journey takes them through Europe where they find the perfect cover, a travelling circus.

programme.title: Megamind
programme.desc: Megamind is the most brilliant super-villain the world has ever known - and the least successful. But when Metro City is threatened by a new villain, can the world's biggest 'mind' actually save the day?

programme.title: Megamind
programme.desc: Megamind is the most brilliant super-villain the world has ever known - and the least successful. But when Metro City is threatened by a new villain, can the world's biggest 'mind' actually save the day?

programme.title: Mr. Peabody & Sherman
programme.desc: Mr Peabody, the most accomplished dog in the world, and his mischievous boy Sherman, use their time machine - the WABAC - to go on the most outrageous adventures known to man or dog. But when Sherman takes the WABAC out for a joyride to impress his friend Penny, they accidentally rip a hole in the universe, wreaking havoc on the most important events in world history. Before they forever alter the past, present and future, Mr. Peabody must come to their rescue, ultimately facing the most daunting challenge of any era: figuring out how to be a parent. Together, the time traveling trio will make their mark on history.

programme.title: Mr. Peabody & Sherman
programme.desc: Mr Peabody, the most accomplished dog in the world, and his mischievous boy Sherman, use their time machine - the WABAC - to go on the most outrageous adventures known to man or dog. Before they forever alter the past, present and future, Mr. Peabody must come to their rescue, ultimately facing the most daunting challenge of any era: figuring out how to be a parent. programme.title: Spin the Bottle
programme.desc: A group of friends plays spin the bottle in a house marked by a massacre, unleashing an evil spirit. As they die in terrifying ways, the survivors must uncover the house's dark secrets.

programme.title: AfrAId
programme.desc: The Curtis family tests a new digital assistant, AIA, which learns their behaviours and anticipates needs. But AIA's protective nature means nothing, or no one, will interfere with them.

programme.title: Germanwings: What Happened On Flight 952
programme.desc: In 2015, Germanwings Flight 9525 crashes in the French Alps, killing 150 passengers and crew members. A decade later, survivors, experts and journalists have their say.

programme.title: The Heist Before Christmas
programme.desc: A Christmas-hating boy meets two Santas in the woods, one of whom claims to have fallen from his sleigh, but he is more interested in the other man when he learns he is on the run for robbing a bank.

programme.title: Watchmen: Chapter I
programme.desc: In an alternate world, the murder of a government sponsored superhero draws his outlawed colleagues out of retirement, into a mystery that threatens their lives and the world itself.

programme.title: Maria
programme.desc: Famed opera singer Maria Callas retreats to Paris in the 1970s after a glamorous yet tumultuous life in the public eye.

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: Marvin, a Milwaukee real estate agent, gets a crimson envelope from a former partner-in-crime. Thrust into a world of hitmen and betrayal, he must face his dark past and a vengeful crime lord brother.

programme.title: The Three Musketeers: D'artagnan
programme.desc: France. D'Artagnan arrives in Paris trying to find his attackers after being left for dead, which leads him to a real war where the future of France is at stake.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
programme.desc: Sonic, Knuckles, and Tails face Shadow, a powerful new foe. Outmatched, they form an unexpected alliance to stop him and protect the planet.

programme.title: Dear Santa
programme.desc: A young boy who, in writing his yearly note to Santa, mixes up the letters and sends it to Satan instead.

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: In Oz, two clashing witches, Elphaba and Glinda, form an unlikely friendship. Elphaba, wrongly labeled wicked, seeks to expose the corrupt Wizard ruling the land.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy
programme.desc: After jumping back into the dating pool, single mother Bridget Jones finds herself caught between a younger man and her son's science teacher.

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: He's a stuntman, and like everyone in the stunt community, he gets blown up, shot, crashed, thrown through windows and dropped from the highest of heights, all for our entertainment. And now, fresh off an almost career-ending accident, this working-class hero has to track down a missing movie star, solve a conspiracy and try to win back the love of his life while still doing his day job. What could possibly go right?

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: The accidental secret agent returns, sent on a mission to stop a group of international assassins before they eliminate a Chinese leader and cause global chaos.

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: The accidental secret agent returns, sent on a mission to stop a group of international assassins before they eliminate a Chinese leader and cause global chaos.

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: The most frightened guy on Earth leads a motley crew of survivors in a world overrun by zombies.

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: The most frightened guy on Earth leads a motley crew of survivors in a world overrun by zombies.

programme.title: The Boss
programme.desc: After doing time for insider trading, an entrepreneur wastes no time in devising a winner-take-all plan to rebuild her empire.

programme.title: The Boss
programme.desc: After doing time for insider trading, an entrepreneur wastes no time in devising a winner-take-all plan to rebuild her empire.

programme.title: Boy
programme.desc: A ten-year-old gets to know his absentee parent when his no-hoper dad returns to their home, searching for loot he buried years before.

programme.title: Boy
programme.desc: A ten-year-old gets to know his absentee parent when his no-hoper dad returns to their home, searching for loot he buried years before.

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: After his dream of stardom on the hockey ice melts, Happy Gilmore discovers he has a gift that could bring him glory on the greens. Trouble is, with his hot head and hard-hitting drives, Happy doesn't just play golf, he destroys it. With the help of a retired golfer and hot publicist, can Happy perfect his game and tame his temper to win the tournament prize money?

programme.title: Happy Gilmore

With the help of a retired golfer and hot publicist, can Happy perfect his game and tame his temper to win the tournament prize money?

programme.title: Grown Ups
programme.desc: Five high school pals reunite after 30 years at a July Fourth celebration and wrestle with the challenges of adulthood. No one wants to be the grown-up of the gang.

programme.title: Grown Ups
programme.desc: Five high school pals reunite after 30 years at a July Fourth celebration and wrestle with the challenges of adulthood. No one wants to be the grown-up of the gang.

programme.title: Here Today
programme.desc: Veteran comedy writer Charlie Burnz forms an unlikely yet hilarious and touching friendship with New York lounge singer Emma Payge. Emma unexpectedly wins a lunch with the comedy legend, and their friendship gets off to an extremely rocky start (think seafood allergy, a hospital visit, and an epi pen). Before long, each finds in the other a sort of soul mate, forging a deep bond that kicks the generation gap aside and redefines the meaning of friendship, love, and trust.

programme.title: Here Today
programme.desc: Veteran comedy writer Charlie Burnz forms an unlikely yet hilarious and touching friendship with New York lounge singer Emma Payge. programme.title: Dumb & Dumber
programme.desc: Lloyd and Harry. One's dumb, the other's dumber. You pick which is which. Lloyd and Harry deliver a delirious no-brainer as they hit the road to return a misplaced briefcase to its owner. The fellas don't know the case is crammed with ransom money. Maybe that's why smashmouth lowlifes are trailing them, you think?

programme.title: The Whole Nine Yards
programme.desc: When hit man Jimmy "The Tulip" Tudeski moves into a comfy suburb, everyone's suddenly in danger of pushing up daisies.

programme.title: Bad News Bears
programme.desc: Grizzled former professional baseball player Morris Buttermaker (Billy Bob Thornton) is recruited by a strait-laced lawyer (Marcia Gay Harden) to coach the Bears, a woefully inept Little League team. He's got to find a way to drive this gang of 12 misfits to a championship against their hated rivals: the Yankees and their overbearing coach (Greg Kinnear). A hilarious homage to an irreverent 1976 comedy, THE BAD NEWS BEARS.
